title: @adam
text:
About me

I am an intern at Datacation where I fulfill duties of a Data Science Consultant.
I work with HERAS on predicting the time of componentsâ€™ failure in their products to prevent disruptions in their services.
I am passionate about predictive models and, since recently, webscraping. You can check out my webscraping project here.
I am in the final year of my Bachelor in Econometrics at the Erasmus University Rotterdam.
